title: How to Draw a Tadpole

steps.headline: Determine how big you want your tadpole.
steps.description: It is best to make a cross of how long and wide.

steps.headline: Make an oval around the cross's points.
steps.description: Make sure to touch all of the ends of the cross.

steps.headline: Draw an elongated teardrop from the main body (which will be the widest part of the drop to the end of its tail.)
Draw a couple of light lines leading away from the main body around the tail with a pencil.

text: Determine how big you want your tadpole. It is best to make a cross of how long and wide. Make an oval around the cross's points. Make sure to touch all of the ends of the cross. Color the oval.  Draw an elongated teardrop from the main body (which will be the widest part of the drop to the end of its tail.)  Color in the teardrop.  Draw a couple of light lines leading away from the main body around the tail with a pencil.
